channel.title: Missing weapon models
channel.description:
I have re-downloaded and re-installed Black Mesa twice, both times I used the checksum before installing. I have used r_drawviewmodels 0/1, with viewmodel_fov -1 to 100, but my weapon models are still missing. I have tried enabling, and disabling all of the options in the Black Mesa tab. I'm using DX9, with recommended graphics settings(everything at max). My game is installed at C:\Steam\steamapps\sourcemods\BMS
At the start of the game when I got the hazmat suit, I did see the hand animations if that counts for anything.
Anyone have any idea what's wrong?
[url=https://i.imgur.com/F86Fd.jpg]This is what I'm seeing, I don't see broken textures or purple and black squares, there's just nothing there.[/url]

item.title: Missing weapon models
item.dc:creator: Crinkz
item.description:
Would really like to get this fixed, downloaded from another mirror, didn’t work. Found out if I try to shoot the crossbow, my game crashes.

jmazouri:

I’m also having this issue, but it also seems to be keeping me from throwing grenades/satchel charges; when I click to throw, I hear a click sound but nothing happens. If I try to throw a satchel, I still see the detonator, but it doesn’t do anything if I right click except play the animation.

Yep, same thing happens to me too.
